snippet: One of the two outdoor murals, intended to spruce up blighted neighborhoods, was called pornographic, the other possibly demonic.
abstract: Two outdoor murals painted for Living Walls, project meant to spruce up blighted neighborhoods of Atlanta, have been painted over after complaints from residents that works were either offensive, pornographic or demonic.
lead_paragraph: One of the two outdoor murals, intended to spruce up blighted neighborhoods, was called pornographic, the other possibly demonic.

headline.seo: Two Atlanta Murals Are Painted Over After Complaints
headline.main: Outcry Brings Down Murals in Atlanta Art Project
headline.print_headline: Outcry Brings Down Murals in Atlanta Art Project
